title: Helping Others Improve. Ep 12. "What Are Wards?"

embed.description: This is part of a series, where I try and help others go from Bronze to silver. Heck maybe even gold. Im not the one playing, Im spectating a game. If you are bronze and want some help, let me know.

body:
sorry that this is extremely long, alot... of... bronze things happened this guy.
This is really cringe like.

replies.body:
I've started watching your vids
You are harsh and borderline asshole but god damn it.. I love it
I like how harsh you are and learning alot

Mate, your head would explode if you saw one of my games :)

lol, have you seen my ranked games?
Im incredibly salty as fuck in those.

And I have to be harsh, otherwise no one learns.
And all of them (But 1 guy, as he gives no fucks and cannot even get mad even if he was filled with rage- AKA waaay too extremely chilled) have actually improved a little bit.

And thank you
